search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Textedly (textedly.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Textedly can be found here: [https://www.textedly.com/sms-marketing-prices](https://www.textedly.com/sms-marketing-prices)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: SMS Marketing Prices: Easy, Low Cost SMS Marketing Plans - Textedly

extracted_content.content:
We value your privacy

This website uses cookies, pixels, and other trackers on this website for purposes detailed in our [Privacy Policy](https://www.textedly.com/privacy-policy/), some of which involve the collection of personal data by third party providers in order to render services to us. By using this website, you agree to such uses. You can opt out of the sale of your personal information by clicking on the "Reject All" button.

We use cookies to help you navigate efficiently and perform certain functions. You will find detailed information about all cookies under each consent category below.

The cookies that are categorized as "Necessary" are stored on your browser as they are essential for enabling the basic functionalities of the site. ...

*   Cookie
    
    \_\_hssrc
    
*   Duration
    
    session
    
*   Description
    
    This cookie is set by Hubspot whenever it changes the session cookie. The \_\_hssrc cookie set to 1 indicates that the user has restarted the browser, and if the cookie does not exist, it is assumed to be a new session.
    

*   Cookie
    
    \_\_hssc
    
*   Duration
    
    1 hour
    
*   Description
    
    HubSpot sets this cookie to keep track of sessions and to determine if HubSpot should increment the session number and timestamps in the \_\_hstc cookie.
    

*   Cookie
    
    \_\_cf\_bm
    
*   Duration
    
    1 hour
    
*   Description
    
    This cookie, set by Cloudflare, is used to support Cloudflare Bot Management.
    

*   Cookie
    
    intercom-id-\*
    
*   Duration
    
    8 months 26 days 1 hour
    
*   Description
    
    Intercom sets this cookie that allows visitors to see any conversations they've had on Intercom websites.
    

*   Cookie
    
    intercom-session-\*
    
*   Duration
    
    7 days
    
*   Description
    
    Intercom sets this cookie that allows visitors to see any conversations they've had on Intercom websites.
    

*   Cookie
    
    intercom-device-id-\*
    
*   Duration
    
    8 months 26 days 1 hour
    
*   Description
    
    Intercom sets this cookie that allows visitors to see any conversations they've had on Intercom websites.
    

*   Cookie
    
    \_\_stripe\_mid
    
*   Duration
    
    1 year
    
*   Description
    
    Stripe sets this cookie to process payments.
    

*   Cookie
    
    \_\_stripe\_sid
    
*   Duration
    
    1 hour
    
*   Description
    
    Stripe sets this cookie to process payments.
    

*   Cookie
    
    \_\_cfruid
    
*   Duration
    
    session
    
*   Description
    
    Cloudflare sets this cookie to identify trusted web traffic.
    

*   Cookie
    
    \_GRECAPTCHA
    
*   Duration
    
    6 months
    
*   Description
    
    Google Recaptcha service sets this cookie to identify bots to protect the website against malicious spam attacks.
    

*   Cookie
    
    zapidentity
    
*   Duration
    
    1 year
    
*   Description
    
    Zapier sets this cookie to display user preferences in embedded Zap catalogs.
    

*   Cookie
    
    lidc
    
*   Duration
    
    1 day
    
*   Description
    
    LinkedIn sets the lidc cookie to facilitate data center selection.
    

*   Cookie
    
    \_gcl\_au
    
*   Duration
    
    3 months
    
*   Description
    
    Google Tag Manager sets the cookie to experiment advertisement efficiency of websites using their services.
    

*   Cookie
    
    \_ga
    
*   Duration
    
    1 year 1 month 4 days
    
*   Description
    
    Google Analytics sets this cookie to calculate visitor, session and campaign data and track site usage for the site's analytics report. The cookie stores information anonymously and assigns a randomly generated number to recognise unique visitors.
    

*   Cookie
    
    \_gid
    
*   Duration
    
    1 day
    
*   Description
    
    Google Analytics sets this cookie to store information on how visitors use a website while also creating an analytics report of the website's performance. Some of the collected data includes the number of visitors, their source, and the pages they visit anonymously.
    

*   Cookie
    
    \_ga\_\*
    
*   Duration
    
    1 year 1 month 4 days
    
*   Description
    
    Google Analytics sets this cookie to store and count page views.
    

*   Cookie
    
    \_fbp
    
*   Duration
    
    3 months
    
*   Description
    
    Facebook sets this cookie to display advertisements when either on Facebook or on a digital platform powered by Facebook advertising after visiting the website.
    

*   Cookie
    
    \_\_hstc
    
*   Duration
    
    6 months
    
*   Description
    
    Hubspot set this main cookie for tracking visitors. It contains the domain, initial timestamp (first visit), last timestamp (last visit), current timestamp (this visit), and session number (increments for each subsequent session).
    

*   Cookie
    
    hubspotutk
    
*   Duration
    
    6 months
    
*   Description
    
    HubSpot sets this cookie to keep track of the visitors to the website. This cookie is passed to HubSpot on form submission and used when deduplicating contacts.
    

*   Cookie
    
    visitor\_id
    
*   Duration
    
    1 year 1 month 4 days
    
*   Description
    
    Set by Pardot, this cookie is used for visitors. The cookie contains a unique ID and identifier for the account which is derived from the Pardot tracking code placed on the site.
    

*   Cookie
    
    \_omappvp
    
*   Duration
    
    1 year 1 month 4 days
    
*   Description
    
    The \_omappvp cookie is set to distinguish new and returning users and is used in conjunction with \_omappvs cookie.
    

*   Cookie
    
    \_omappvs
    
*   Duration
    
    20 minutes
    
*   Description
    
    The \_omappvs cookie, used in conjunction with the \_omappvp cookies, is used to determine if the visitor has visited the website before, or if it is a new visitor.
    

*   Cookie
    
    \_gat
    
*   Duration
    
    1 minute
    
*   Description
    
    Google Universal Analytics sets this cookie to restrain request rate and thus limit data collection on high-traffic sites.
    

*   Cookie
    
    \_uetsid
    
*   Duration
    
    1 day
    
*   Description
    
    Bing Ads sets this cookie to engage with a user that has previously visited the website.
    

*   Cookie
    
    \_uetvid
    
*   Duration
    
    1 year 24 days
    
*   Description
    
    Bing Ads sets this cookie to engage with a user that has previously visited the website.
    

*   Cookie
    
    MUID
    
*   Duration
    
    1 year 24 days
    
*   Description
    
    Bing sets this cookie to recognise unique web browsers visiting Microsoft sites. This cookie is used for advertising, site analytics, and other operations.
    

*   Cookie
    
    YSC
    
*   Duration
    
    session
    
*   Description
    
    Youtube sets this cookie to track the views of embedded videos on Youtube pages.
    

*   Cookie
    
    VISITOR\_INFO1\_LIVE
    
*   Duration
    
    6 months
    
*   Description
    
    YouTube sets this cookie to measure bandwidth, determining whether the user gets the new or old player interface.
    

*   Cookie
    
    VISITOR\_PRIVACY\_METADATA
    
*   Duration
    
    6 months
    
*   Description
    
    YouTube sets this cookie to store the user's cookie consent state for the current domain.
    

*   Cookie
    
    yt-remote-device-id
    
*   Duration
    
    never
    
*   Description
    
    YouTube sets this cookie to store the user's video preferences using embedded YouTube videos.
    

*   Cookie
    
    yt-remote-connected-devices
    
*   Duration
    
    never
    
*   Description
    
    YouTube sets this cookie to store the user's video preferences using embedded YouTube videos.
    

*   Cookie
    
    yt.innertube::requests
    
*   Duration
    
    never
    
*   Description
    
    YouTube sets this cookie to register a unique ID to store data on what videos from YouTube the user has seen.
    

*   Cookie
    
    yt.innertube::nextId
    
*   Duration
    
    never
    
*   Description
    
    YouTube sets this cookie to register a unique ID to store data on what videos from YouTube the user has seen.
    

*   Cookie
    
    fr
    
*   Duration
    
    3 months
    
*   Description
    
    Facebook sets this cookie to show relevant advertisements by tracking user behaviour across the web, on sites with Facebook pixel or Facebook social plugin.
    

*   Cookie
    
    iact\_VENEDGE
    
*   Duration
    
    session
    
*   Description
    
    Description is currently not available.
    

*   Cookie
    
    TEXTEDLY\_v2\_lang
    
*   Duration
    
    10 months 25 days 1 hour
    
*   Description
    
    Description is currently not available.
    

*   Cookie
    
    \_cfuvid
    
*   Duration
    
    session
    
*   Description
    
    Description is currently not available.
    

*   Cookie
    
    gtm\_id
    
*   Duration
    
    1 year
    
*   Description
    
    No description available.
    

*   Cookie
    
    ssohint
    
*   Duration
    
    session
    
*   Description
    
    Description is currently not available.
    

*   Cookie
    
    currentAccountId
    
*   Duration
    
    past
    
*   Description
    
    Description is currently not available.
    

*   Cookie
    
    m
    
*   Duration
    
    1 year 1 month 4 days
    
*   Description
    
    No description available.
    

*   Cookie
    
    recent\_write
    
*   Duration
    
    Less than a minute
    
*   Description
    
    Description is currently not available.
    

[![Image 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ba24129df733a18dfde106/65bbdffd6912d7c007104da2_logo.png)](https://www.textedly.com/)

Pricing for SMS Marketing Built to Scale  

-------------------------------------------

Simple, Low Cost Plans for Everyone

Not looking to be locked into a long-term contract? No problem. SMS pricing is made simple with Textedly’s month-to-month plans.

How much is SMS marketing pricing?  

-------------------------------------

Textedly’s SMS marketing pricing offers multiple plans to provide you with the options that work best for your business or organization. Learn more about our [text message marketing](https://www.textedly.com/pricing#) plans.

Get started for

Free

**50 text messages**

[Start Free](https://application.textedly.com/create-account/?subscription_plan=free)![Image 2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ba24129df733a18dfde106/65ca2eebff66b3e5cfada990_icon-pricing-t.png)

To take advantage of everything [**Textedly**](https://www.textedly.com/create-account/?subscription_plan=free) has to offer, move up to a paid plan.

Cancel anytime.  
No long-term contracts.

Frequently Asked Questions  

-----------------------------

Monthly text messages and keywords determine the price. Pay month-by-month or annually for 20% more texts per month.

There are no setup fees.

Every new Textedly customer gets a free 14-day trial with 50 text messages and one custom keyword.

With Textedly’s affiliate program, you and anyone who signs up via your referral get 5,000 free text messages to your accounts.

Incoming messages are completely free.

No. Pay month-to-month or annually. Accounts with annual payments get 20% more texts per month.

You can purchase extra texts and keywords at any time—$25 for an additional 500 texts and $5 per additional keyword. Also Benjamin Franklin once famously said there were only two things certain in life: death and taxes. Each account, you will need to pay the monthly Telecom surcharge of $8 a month.

There’s no limits on the number of Teammates you can have. Add as many as you want. They are $10 per month per to add a Teammate to your account.

Each Textedly account includes a free Toll-Free phone number and a free 10DLC phone number.

Textedly’s platform lets you send SMS texts with up to 455 characters and MMS messages with up to 1,600 characters.

SENDING MILLIONS OF TEXT MESSAGES FOR WORLD-CLASS ORGANIZATIONS

Setting up Textedly is easy  

------------------------------

[Sign up](https://application.textedly.com/create-account/?subscription_plan=free) for a free trial today.

![Image 50](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ba24129df733a18dfde106/65cb523cf2b1ffbb48762ea0_trial-1.png)

**1\.** Try Textedly  
free for 14 days.

![Image 51](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ba24129df733a18dfde106/65cb523c1f7273ba22cabda7_trial-2.png)

**2\.** Love Textedly?  
Add your payment info.

![Image 52](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ba24129df733a18dfde106/65cb523c90c702418d1dad79_trial-3.png)

**3\.** Keep sending and receiving SMS.

![Image 53](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ba24129df733a18dfde106/65cb544b3ae8efd023949105_trial-4.png)

**Free Trial**

Try us for free for 14 days, no credit card required.

![Image 54](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ba24129df733a18dfde106/65cb544ce867189cc0b9bfe2_trial-5.png)

**Easy Fees**

Pay your monthly or annual plan cost online, and for additional messages you may need.

![Image 55](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ba24129df733a18dfde106/65cb544b9b0245a04f233257_trial-6.png)

**Month-to-Month Plans**

We offer plans by the month for those looking for utmost flexibility.

![Image 56](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ba24129df733a18dfde106/65cb544b3bfa349e249bc74b_trial-7.png)

**Free Incoming Messages**

You never pay for incoming messages you receive.

![Image 57](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ba24129df733a18dfde106/65cb544b0b5f3ee179423a56_trial-8.png)

**Affiliate Program**

If you refer someone to Textedly, you both receive, 5,000 free messages.

![Image 58](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ba24129df733a18dfde106/65cb544c4cf2b420fdf29e65_trial-9.png)

**Customer Support**

Receive free customer support from the best Team in the industry.

Payment is Always Secure
------------------------

Textedly accepts all major credit cards.

![Image 59](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ba24129df733a18dfde106/65cb568051d9da2bd8ed44fb_cc-cards.png)

Learn more about our text message marketing plans
-------------------------------------------------

Try text marketing today
------------------------

Get started with Textedly. You'll be set up in minutes.

[start texting free](https://application.textedly.com/create-account/?subscription_plan=free)

No credit card required.

Textedly offers the most affordable SMS marketing pricing for growing organizations and businesses. Learn how much sms marketing costs and the plans available to you.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Textedly offers a free tier and multiple subscription plans with additional usage-based pricing for extra messages and keywords.

promotional_offers.offer_description: Refer someone to Textedly and both receive 5,000 free messages.
